title: Webhook Triggers Settings
description: Trigger external webhooks from YouTrack events such as issue creation, updates, deletion, comments (add/edit/delete), work items (add/edit/delete), and attachments (add/remove). Configure multiple webhook URLs per event in the project settings.

webhookSignature.title: Webhook signature
webhookSignature.description: Secret signature for authentication (required for security). Must be at least 32 characters long.

webhooksOnIssueCreated.title: Issue created
webhooksOnIssueCreated.description: Triggered when a new issue is created

webhooksOnIssueUpdated.title: Issue updated
webhooksOnIssueUpdated.description: Triggered when an issue is modified

webhooksOnIssueDeleted.title: Issue deleted
webhooksOnIssueDeleted.description: Triggered when an issue is removed

webhooksOnCommentAdded.title: Comment added
webhooksOnCommentAdded.description: Triggered when a comment is added to an issue

webhooksOnCommentUpdated.title: Comment updated
webhooksOnCommentUpdated.description: Triggered when a comment is modified

webhooksOnCommentDeleted.title: Comment deleted
webhooksOnCommentDeleted.description: Triggered when a comment is removed

webhooksOnAttachmentAdded.title: Attachment added
webhooksOnAttachmentAdded.description: Triggered when an attachment is added to an issue

webhooksOnAttachmentDeleted.title: Attachment deleted
webhooksOnAttachmentDeleted.description: Triggered when an attachment is removed

webhooksOnWorkItemAdded.title: Work item added
webhooksOnWorkItemAdded.description: Triggered when time is logged on an issue

webhooksOnWorkItemUpdated.title: Work item updated
webhooksOnWorkItemUpdated.description: Triggered when a work item is modified

webhooksOnWorkItemDeleted.title: Work item deleted
webhooksOnWorkItemDeleted.description: Triggered when a work item is removed

webhooksOnAllEvents.title: All events
webhooksOnAllEvents.description: Triggered on any event (issue created/updated/deleted, comments, attachments, work items)
